meanings.definition: An object, quality, or event whose presence or occurrence indicates the probable presence or occurrence of something else.
meanings.sent1: Seeing dark clouds is a sign of rain approaching.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign at the intersection helps drivers know when to halt.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel waving at me was a funny sign to start my day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a sign of her inner happiness shining through.
meanings.sent5: The loud thunder was a clear sign of the approaching storm.

meanings.definition: A gesture or action used to convey information or instructions.
meanings.sent1: A thumbs-up sign from the coach meant we were doing well.
meanings.sent2: The traffic officer used hand signs to direct the cars.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated wink was a sign for me to join in the joke.
meanings.sent4: The high-five between friends was a sign of their strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The raised hand was a sign for permission to speak in class.

meanings.definition: A mark or symbol used to represent something.
meanings.sent1: The plus sign in math indicates addition.
meanings.sent2: The heart sign on the card showed love and affection.
meanings.sent3: The peace sign drawn on the wall was a cool decoration.
meanings.sent4: The dollar sign represents money in many countries.
meanings.sent5: The star sign on the map marked the location of the treasure.
